title: Rugby Challenge 2-FLT
description:
In Their 26th Year Of Glory, FairLight Released #1105

Rugby Challenge 2 (c) Sidhe Interactive

Supplied by: FAIRLIGHT
Release Date: 24/07/2013
Cracked by: FAIRLIGHT
Game Type: Sport
Packaged by: FAIRLIGHT
Image Format: ISO

DISCS: 1 DVD
Protection: Steam

System Requirements : (S)-1-phenylpropan-2-amine


Game information:
=================

Immerse your senses in the greatest rugby game ever, Rugby Challenge 2.
Rugby Challenge, with the legendary Jonah Lomu still at the helm, has
evolved and boasts a plethora of new content.

Rugby Challenge 2 features 110+ teams and 50+ stadia from around the world including licenses for the All Blacks, the Qantas Wallabies, British and Irish Lions 2013 Tour of Australia, the USA Eagles, Bledisloe Cup, Barbarians FC, Combined Country, Super Rugby teams, AVIVA Premiership Rugby, TOP 14, Pro D2, RaboDirect PRO12, ITM Cup, and the Ranfurly Shield.

Refined and expanded gameplay with the addition of quick taps, quick
lineouts, mauls from lineouts, interceptions, contesting ball at the breakdown, removing players from the ruck, number 8 scrum pickups, and dynamic in-game team strategies.

Game modes including Single Match, The Lions Tour, Competitions, an expanded multi-year Career Mode, Tutorials, and Online play with up to 4v4 multiplayer. Gamers can expect revamped sound and commentary systems, with real-time commentary from Grant Nisbett and former All Black Justin Marshall, along with French language commentary from Eric Bayle and Thomas Lombard.

It also offers more options to create or customise players, teams, and
competitions, to change game rules and behaviour so the game plays the way you want it to.

Installation Information:
=====================

* Burn or mount
* Install
* Play the game

NOTE: As usual, block the game exe in your firewall.

/TEAM FAiRLIGHT
